welcome: Welcome to Wahfy! Together, we can make a difference.

about-section.title: About Wahfy
about-section.subtitle: Helping Each Other Can Make the World Better
about-section.description: Wahfy is dedicated to supporting families in need, providing hope and resources when it matters most. Our mission is to empower communities through compassion, transparency, and action.

left.title: Start Helping Team
list: We unite volunteers and donors to solve real problems.
Every contribution makes a difference in someone's life.

overview.title: 5 Star Rating
overview.description: Wahfy has made a real difference in our community. Their dedication to helping families in need is truly inspiring.

reviews.text: Wahfy supported my family during a very difficult time. Their compassion and quick response gave us hope when we needed it most.
I have volunteered with Wahfy for two years. The impact we make together is incredible, and the team is like a family.
Donating through Wahfy is easy and transparent. I know my contributions are reaching those who need them most.
